website_summaries.verdict: This 2-tone women's watch from Seiko strikes a perfect balance between utilitarian solar power and feminine beauty.
pros: Crystal-studded bezel with pearlescent dial and stainless steel case
Withstands splashes or brief immersion in water
cons: Solar charging panel can stop working

customer_reviews.title: It just is a piece of beautiful junk. And the battery cost almost as much ...i did write qa review but never heard fro companyit
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased this watch on 2/10/17. IT HAS STOPPED WORKING. I wouldn't give it any rating if i could.This is a Seiko watch and should last a lot longer than a few months.. I am very upset with this purchase. It is supposed to be a Solar watch but it does't keep time at all. It just is a piece of beautiful junk. And the battery cost almost as much as the watch. Yes it it is solar and battery. Very poor customer service on someone. It is costing me $92. 00 to get it fixed
customer_reviews.author: ROY J. GEYER

customer_reviews.title: Truly classic
customer_reviews.text: This watch is fantastic. Ideal for casual or formal dressing; truly classic. I spent hours upon hours looking for a watch meeting the following requirements: -mother of pearl face -has date -non cartoonish numbers (preferably Roman numerals) -gold & silver to match with all my jewelry This watch is perfect. Great size, face is not big, but not dainty either. I will maintain my 5 star rating as long as the crystals last/stay put for 1+ yrs.
customer_reviews.author: MARY

customer_reviews.title: Dishonest Seller
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch for my grandmother. But before I could take it out from the box to adjust the strap, it fell off. Poor product quality. Very dishonest seller who brings shame to Seiko. I am not sure if this is even a genuine product..! Cheat! Update: Watch stopped working after 2 months! Fcuking dishonest seller! Beware!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: great look and size
customer_reviews.text: This is a comfortable watch that looks very nice - the bling of the crystals is just right and the dial is a decent size. Also fits a wrist that is slightly bigger than "average". I have typically worn men's watches just because I prefer being able to see the dial... this is the nicest women's watch I have found in a while.
customer_reviews.author: L. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this watch
customer_reviews.text: WOW. So glad I bought this watch. This is the type of timepiece to take you anywhere. Dress it up or wear it with jeans. Wear it to work. The mother of pearl face is beautiful and the crystal bezel is just enough without being too much. Took it out of the box and it kept excellent time from the start. I put mine on a windowsill to give it a sunlight charge - so simple - never go to the bother of having batteries replaced again. Yeah! Wearing it right now and when I look at it to reference the time - it makes me happy.
customer_reviews.author: avariciousreader

customer_reviews.title: Runs slowly when fully charged.
customer_reviews.text: The watch worked for about a week, then stopped keeping time, shortly after Amazon's "return window" closed. According to Seiko, if the watch runs slowly, you need to place it in a sunny place for several hours. My wife did this multiple times, being careful not to let the watch overheat. It still runs extremely slowly -- as in 2 to 3 hours behind the correct time, after wearing it. Seiko's documentation makes no allowance that the watch may be bad, or the battery may be bad. It is either accurate, or you need to place it in the sun. There is no middle ground. I would return this if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Tod Kemper

customer_reviews.title: Not Dependable, Will Suddenly Die
customer_reviews.text: It was a beautiful and functional watch when it worked. But after 9 months of consistent use, it just suddenly died. No amount of sun exposure could get the watch to fully recharge. It would die again within minutes of being placed out of any light source. Although I was initially excited about never having to get a watch battery replaced again by going solar, I now completely regret the decision. In the end this watch was utterly useless and a waste of money. I’m back to purchasing battery operated watches that are actually reliable.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the quality. The calendar is very small and hard to read but the face of the watch is great for my eyesight.It is dressy for Sunday and evening wear and also for daily wear. I got it as an wedding gift and love it.
customer_reviews.author: selucky

customer_reviews.title: Excellent watch
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing mine almost every single day for over four years now. I bought a kit as well to shorten the band, and have had no issues. My watch did need some extra time to charge after the first few months, but since then I honestly have not had to actively charge it. Ever. It seems to get enough sun from everyday wear. Only in the last couple weeks has the strap started to unlock a bit easier than it should, but after everything it's been through, I absolutely cannot complain. The glass face has no marks on it, and I have knocked it into EVERYTHING. I love this watch so much.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Wattch , Good value
customer_reviews.text: Like the Solar watches as they are comparable to Citizens echo drive an are good value. Mother of Peal matched our Mother of Pear Jewelry which is why we bought it. Large face, easy to ready.. Just what we wanted
customer_reviews.author: Lanny  S.

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold solar charge
customer_reviews.text: I received this beautiful watch as a Christmas gift last year and loved it. Unfortunately it does not hold a solar charge after a year. I have to place it under a strong light source every other day to keep it running. Wish I had known this was going to happen before purchasing the Men's Seiko Solar watch for my husband this year for Christmas. This particular Seiko product has not lived up to the brand image.
customer_reviews.author: texas lady

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous watch
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this watch. I've only had it about a month but, thus far, it's run accurately and shows the correct date. I like it so much that I can't stop looking at and admiring it. I expect to have it running efficiently for a long time. It replaces another Seiko solar watch that started giving me problems; however, it seems to be back on track. If you purchase this watch, which I highly recommend, you definitely won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: elaine steinle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch but capacitor troubles and getting it back from Seiko if it ever gets fixed.
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch but it only lasted a spring/summer and died. Took it to a local jeweler where he said capacitor was shot, so he ordered one (3 times) and none fit my watch. So without telling me he sent to Seiko for repair (February 2020), though I could have done that and had it back within a month or two, buy maybe not. He's had it since October 2019. I don't think I'll ever see it again. Save your warranty in case battery or capacitor stop working after 7 months.
customer_reviews.author: Opal

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: Really like this watch, looks really good and very easy to wear, not heavy like some watches seem to be! The band is very easy to put on, love the fact that it doesn't need batteries. It's now February 8, this watch has completely stopped working, very disappointed. As it is a very good looking watch. I had a Seiko a few years ago, it lasted a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Aussieann

customer_reviews.title: A beauty of a watch!
customer_reviews.text: I love the band with alternating gold and silver and the secure clasp. I love the face abd the stones around it. It’s a little smaller than I normally wear, but I really, really like it. It just arrived today so I’m hopeful it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mixed Feelings
customer_reviews.text: This watch was purchased as a gift. I have purchased multiple seikos over the years and have found the quality to be quite good. That being said, this specific model left me quite wanting. The bracelet was alot lighter and thinner than expected. In some cases, this may be a good thing but this particular instance resulted in the watch feeling cheaper than it should. Other than this, the watch itself has held up quite well so it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: timothy teachout

customer_reviews.title: SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: The Seiko Solar watch I purchased a year ago never worked right! The longest it ran was for three hours! It was sent to Seiko and was returned still not work in! I then reordered another, because I was told by an Amazon rep that I would be taken care of! Well this didn't happen and I'm very, very upset! Now I have two watches, the same exact watch; one works and I'm stuck with one that never worked. Never will order a watch from Amazon. My orders are many but no more...
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: No Longer Works---6 Months Later
customer_reviews.text: Thought this would be a great purchase...it's a nice-looking watch and matches both my silver and gold jewelry. However, less than 6 months after purchasing the solar-powered watch, it has stopped working!!! Thought Seiko was better than this.....
customer_reviews.author: Anita English

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but not so great at keeping time
customer_reviews.text: This watch is beautiful and stylish. I got it for my girlfriend for our one year anniversary as a special remembrance gift but then 9 months later the watch began to struggle with remembering what time it was. It is now constantly off by several hours and if unedited for days. We followed all of the instructions for if the battery was low but that fixed nothing. The watch is pretty but you definitely need a watch that works.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden Smith

customer_reviews.title: The solar battery sucks.
customer_reviews.text: The solar battery did not last any time at all. Stopped recharging before a year was up. I put it my my purse to take to a watch repair place and forgot about it until after the warranty was up. Very disappointed in this Seiko. Others I have had were great.
customer_reviews.author: Jane T. C.

customer_reviews.title: It’s the perfect watch!
customer_reviews.text: I got this watch 3 years ago. I wanted a solar watch because it seemed I was constantly having to replace the batteries in my other watches. Since I bought this one I have worn it almost every day. I love it and am very happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. The band and case are beautiful. The Swarovski crystals are very brilliant and shiny. The Mother of Pearl face is so light reflective and pretty. The size of the face is perfect. I have a 6" wrist and it doesn't look too big at all. Love the solar feature, no more batteries to replace. It took just minutes to charge my watch and I was wearing it the same day. Love the stainless steel band and know it will look great for years to come. I would highly recommend this watch.
customer_reviews.author: shoehorse

customer_reviews.title: It is beautiful and works like a watch should
customer_reviews.text: My husband gave this watch to me for Christmas. It is beautiful and works like a watch should. I like it because I can see what it is showing without looking hard. Seiko is a good brand and I have had others previously. I really enjoy this watch. I recommend the Seiko of this size if you want to see the time easily. If you like the style and if you want a good watch.
customer_reviews.author: TeTi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: Love the two-tone band, mother of pearl dial, crystals, legibility of the numbers and the date feature. Nothing to dislike. I had two links removed to fit on my wrist with just the amount of slippage I prefer. Easy closure. Not too big or too small in width of band.
customer_reviews.author: Johnine

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive woman's jewelry as well as a beautiful timepiece
customer_reviews.text: Gave this watch to my wife as an anniversary present, and she has yet to remove it - beautiful watch, keeps perfect time (still within 1 second of my cell time after a month). My wife has small wrists and the watch is (I would say) medium-sized, but a good watch repairman adjusted the band for her and it looks really great on her. Solar charge works just fine under any light even here in the rainy Pacific Northwest. Very satisfied. I've worn my own Seiko diver's watch for more than ten years and have had excellent service from it as well. Navyweather1
customer_reviews.author: Navyweather1

customer_reviews.title: She began wanting a watch with more of a silver-tone and when she saw this watch she fell on love with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought my wife a gold-tone Seiko watch some 25-30 years ago. The only care it has needed is battery replacement and an occasional cleaning. She began wanting a watch with more of a silver-tone and when she saw this watch she fell on love with it. She loved the Swarovski crystals around the dial and the fact that it solar and won't need battery replacement. We ordered it on Amazon Prime and had it in 2 days. She is delighted with it. The only thing we had to do was have a jeweler adjust the band to fit her better. That cost was not significant.
customer_reviews.author: LRC

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Too late to return
customer_reviews.text: Although it is a lovely watch, it does not keep time well. I put it in the sun for 1 hour as directed. It is supposed to keep a 6 month charge after 1 hour of sunlight. I am lucky if the watch runs 24 hours. Very disappointed. Too late to return. Sent it to the authorized Seiko repair in New Jersey. paid $8 postage. They claimed to have 'repaired' my watch. It still doesn't run. Beyond frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: SusiQ

customer_reviews.title: Good watch. Poor contrast.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something of a high contrast dial and numbers. This watch did not quite provide the needed contrast. I was also expecting the crystals to be more sparkly. This is my 5th Seiko Solar purchase. I buy them as presents to give away. The Seiko Solar watches themselves are fantastic. There are several other designs in the same price range that I have bought.
customer_reviews.author: UndeservingFavor

customer_reviews.title: Quality watch. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this watch for my mom for Mother's Day. She requested something that had both gold and silver and was a little more dressy than your typical watch. In fact, she asked for "bling." This watch is gorgeous. It's face is not as large as I feared but definitely large enough to read the dial. The Mother of Pearl details are stunning and it's solar-powered to boot. The clasp is easy to get on and off. I would consider buying this watch for myself.
customer_reviews.author: bdorn

customer_reviews.title: Reliability and style in an affordable package!!
customer_reviews.text: I own two Seiko solar powered watches. After 5 plus years where sometimes one of them is in a box in a drawer, they continue to run and keep perfect time. I couldn't be more satisfied with this product and so I wanted my wife to have one as well. Very stylish yet very durable besides being totally reliable!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Palmieri

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing because it was pretty and had a calendar on it
customer_reviews.text: This watch lasted less than a year. I sent it back to the Seiko company and they wanted to charge me $130. to repair it. They said it was not under warranty. I checked my paperwork and according to my records, it was still under warranty. Very disappointing because it was pretty and had a calendar on it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharla Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.....
customer_reviews.text: Love it at first however now many if the crystals have either come out or become tarnished. I don't recommend This watch due to this fact. Bad workmanship with the details Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: kama Lumley

customer_reviews.title: Jeweler took out two links for free for a better fit and remarked that a new solar battery for ...
customer_reviews.text: Wife had similar solar Seiko for many years and this one is a step up with the crystals. She wears it everyday. Loves the pearl faceplate. Jeweler took out two links for free for a better fit and remarked that a new solar battery for the old watch costs $90. So, we were glad to just go with a new one.
customer_reviews.author: jko

customer_reviews.title: Good for four years
customer_reviews.text: The solar power has been great, but it is no longer holding a charge now four years later. You cannot replace the battery, so I will need a new watch.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful elegant watch
customer_reviews.text: I am a seiko watch wearer for 40 plus years. I felt it time to try a solar watch since I'm getting tired of replacing the batteries. Could not have picked a nicer looking watch! It has a bigger face- for me, it's much easier to read. Can wear for a dress up event as well as casual jeans and boots. I have a small wrist 6inches and it was no problem for a watch person to adjust for me.
customer_reviews.author: Wawa95

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful watch. I wear it every day and it is also dressy enough for more formal occasions. Easy to read face, but I agree with others that the date window is too small for me to read. I like the sparkle of the crystals around the face, and the mother of pearl watch face has an even tone. My daughter wants one, and I told her I will get her one as a present when she graduates college next year. She was happy about that, except for the wait.
customer_reviews.author: nanam

customer_reviews.title: Battery failed twice
customer_reviews.text: Battery failed to charge. Shipped back, reordered , same story. Gave up on this brand. Wile I really liked size and design, battery not working twice was major turn off. Guess what, kids gave me Citizens watch for Christmas and it is working. Your loss.
customer_reviews.author: Astra

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my wife a couple of years ago and she is hard on watches. This one has held up very well and is a beautiful watch. I am a watch nut and I believe this is a great watch and a great value!
customer_reviews.author: ohmy

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch!
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch, it's looks, and the solar power. Have gotten great compliments and enjoy the 'bling'... now the big test is if it will be solar powered enough to last the winter in the Pacific Northwest! We'll find out.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie's Breath

customer_reviews.title: didn't disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a watch to go with my gold wedding band. Less expensive option than upgrading the ring. Everything popular seems to be in silver color. Thought this might be too large or formal, but it's perfect! Love the large face for easy reading, but watch is not so big it looks like a man's watch. Pleased that crystals were flush -- won't get caught on anything. I can dress up or dress casual with this watch. Seiko brand and solar makes this a hands down winner!
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: The watch is very nice; in fact
customer_reviews.text: The watch is very nice; in fact, it is dressy. I knew it had the Mother of Pearl face, but I'm not a big fan. I will keep it and use it when I need to dress up a bit. Not an everyday watch to wear around the house..... The size is very good; not too big. Yes, I would recomend it to anyone who wants a watch that's a bit fancy. A beautiful, thin silver bracelet would go great with it.....
customer_reviews.author: Nana 2 go

customer_reviews.title: Seiko is a winner!
customer_reviews.text: Have worn a seiko watch for 20 yrs. I lost mine at the beach 2 weeks ago and ordered the new one almost immediately! Looks great, is comfortable to wear and easy to read. Already been spit up on by 4 mo old grandson, and been dunked in the sink!! Very satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Thus far I am very happy with this watch. It is a mix of gold and silver tones, so it looks fine with any other jewelry. The crystals around the face also drew it up a bit, but I also wear it for every day. Not having to worry about batteries is what I really wanted, and it fits that bill also. The price seems good .
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Fratus

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch!
customer_reviews.text: My husband gave me this watch for Christmas and I am thrilled. It’s both classy and yet can be worn on any occasion....Wonderful purchase
customer_reviews.author: Dragon1950

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this watch for a few days, but I love it so far! It is really beautiful. The watch face is the effect size....not too small...not overly big like some people wear them these days. The rose gold color on the and is a little more subtle than I had wanted....but it's ok. It's really a great long watch.
customer_reviews.author: Mcash

customer_reviews.title: picture doesnt do it justice
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely beautiful watch. It looks expensive. It was to replace a 16 year old Seiko Solar watch that finally needed a new battery after 16 years Great quality products.
customer_reviews.author: Jim.

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant watch
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife's birthday. She loves it and looks just as good as the pictures depicted. Not over the top bling bling. Just right. We will see if the stones stay in place over time. She's very happy with it. I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: sunny johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Watch!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty. Pleased with purchase. Wanted a solar watch as had Citizens Echo watch before and loved it. This is just as nice and more affordable.
customer_reviews.author: S Benisch

customer_reviews.title: Opening the box was a nice surprise. The first impression of the looks was ...
customer_reviews.text: Opening the box was a nice surprise. The first impression of the looks was really outstanding. Setting the date and time was so easy.I set the watch in the sun and it charged perfectly.I put it in a drawer for a day and the time was accurate.I don't know how the watch will hold up. I purchased it as a birthday gift and haven't given it as yet. It also needs to be sized. But from what the other reviews say that is not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: porthos

customer_reviews.title: I had this same watch for SEVERAL years. The ...
customer_reviews.text: I had this same watch for SEVERAL years. The watch band got damaged, could not find a replacement band (they said band was part of the watch, non-replaceable).
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Watch
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping the standard size would fit my larger wrists. It does, but it barely does. I find myself having to open the watch often to adjust it or rub where the watch digs in. I'll have to see if I can get a couple of links added to it. But the look is great and it keeps accurate time. It's no Rolex, but it also didn't have the Rolex price.
customer_reviews.author: Craftylady

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a nice looking every day watch and this one exceded my expectations. Great buy, face is not to small and not to large. Band is less bulky than it appears in the pictures love this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie P.

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: I love wearing this watch because it's so pretty. It's the perfect size-big enough to actually read, but dainty enough to look feminine.
customer_reviews.author: D. Thresher

customer_reviews.title: Very lovely
customer_reviews.text: This lovely watch is not only great to wear, but is very durable. I looks like gold, but is very rugged stainless steel. The tiny diamonds add a very classy touch.
customer_reviews.author: Anne S

customer_reviews.title: Well pleased
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful yet very practical and dependable Nice not having to replace battery
customer_reviews.author: limes

customer_reviews.title: I am super happy to have bought this
customer_reviews.text: I am super happy to have bought this watch. It looks very nice, is not heavy, and is perfect for me. You receive it in a fantastic package, with lots of explanation. I feel like I bought something very exclusive. This is the best gift I offers to myself. I can recommend it to everybody.
customer_reviews.author: Solange Roumans

customer_reviews.title: She was so pleased and loves her new watch
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a gift for my mother because she asked for the watch that charges itself. She was so pleased and loves her new watch. She commented that is looks like my rolex.
customer_reviews.author: K. Waldron

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch and a good value for a brand name watch.
customer_reviews.author: J. Clark

customer_reviews.title: This Seiko ladies watch it is gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Was very pleased with the quality of this ladies Seiko watch bought it for my wife's anniversary I like that it's a solar watch no longer need to change batteries I've set the time and the date holding perfect time it's a nice timepiece I'm more than happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Gene Aversa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Classic
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this watch! I've had it for a few months now, and I am always happy. It is genuine mother of pearl, beautiful, and is charged by sun. I just hope it lasts me a while!
customer_reviews.author: G523

customer_reviews.title: no service from Seiko!
customer_reviews.text: Had this watch for two months and the crystal cracked all the way across the face. put it on dresser to take a shower and it was cracked when picked it up.NO damage to make it crack.Almost like a pressure crack. Called Seiko and they refused to do anything.
customer_reviews.author: Chris L.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old Seiko watch had to have its battery replaced again (usually once a year). This last time, it stopped working after the new battery was installed at the jewelry store I always use. This watch with Swarovski crystals was a great price on Amazon with Prime shipping compared with the same model on sale at Macy's and with an extra 20% off. And the solar feature means that I won't have to replace any batteries in it!
customer_reviews.author: J. L.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking Watch!
customer_reviews.text: Looks even better in person than online. Perfect size, not too big, or too small
customer_reviews.author: J. Samuelson

customer_reviews.title: Battery doesn't hold charge
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in late Jan. 2017 and it doesn't keep time. Today is April 20, 2017. I put it under a light overnight to recharge and a few hours later it is behind the time again.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my choice of this Seiko watch. I like the size of the dial~not too big. And I really like the swarkoski crystals and the push button latch. Solar power is also a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Flopeye girl

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this watch!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this watch! The picture doesn't do it justice. I have a very small wrist so I had the jeweler remove a couple of links. So now it's perfect. Even the jeweler commented on what a nice watch it was! He added that he has a Seiko that is also solar powered and how much he likes it, but that this one is so much nicer!! :) So far it has kept perfect time. No buyers remorse on this one!!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Azbarea

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful...
customer_reviews.text: Have had for less than a week, so cannot speak to longevity. I had four links taken out. Love the way it looks. Silver and gold, mother of pearl face and Roman numerals. Lovely!
customer_reviews.author: Appreciative1

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Vwey nice watch but too small. Great for a youth gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the gold and silver tones to make matching jewelry ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfectly lovely watch. I like the gold and silver tones to make matching jewelry easy. The face size is quite nice...not too large and not too small. My only complaint is that with a certain number of links taken out it's a tiny bit too tight and with one link added it's a bit too large on my wrist. But that will be different for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Stopped keeping time
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several Seiko watches and they have kept time for a good ten years or more. Bought this one in 2016 and no longer keeps time. Because it is solar powered it will cost me more than I paid for the watch to have it repaired. No more solar powered watches for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Hill

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch Everything I Hoped For
customer_reviews.text: The watch is beautiful. The band is shiny and the crystals set the watch off. I had to have one link removed. The date is hard to see but easy to set. I love the pearl face. It keeps good time. It looks rich goes well with everyday clothing out shopping or dressing up for an evening out. I got the watch for myself because I always wanted an Eco Solar watch and the Seiko seemed better looking for the price than the Citizens.
customer_reviews.author: LaLa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for me!!
customer_reviews.text: This watch was just as quickly started, as my gold tone Seiko solar watch. It keeps perfect time, is not too flashy and one can actually wear it with gold or silver jewelry. Love the solar energy, because I don't have to worry about battery replacement (previous watches were always automatics). All in all, a Beauty and a good choice on my part!!
customer_reviews.author: Uta Garrison

customer_reviews.title: I am completely satisfied! The watch looks expensive - with good quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch for myself for Christmas. I read all the reviews on it before I made my purchase. That way, I knew what to expect. I am completely satisfied! The watch looks expensive - with good quality, and not too flashy, but it does catch one's eye. Looks fine on my very small wrist - I did have a few links taken out of the band by a well-known jeweler, with no charge. ANNA
customer_reviews.author: anna o. hingle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and keeps great time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch several months ago, and I love it. It is beautiful, and keeps great time. I love that I don't have to worry about replacing any battery.
customer_reviews.author: Cotton's mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch, but has issues
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch, but disappointed with the rapid capacitor(battery?) failure. The case is almost impossible to open, so home repair is difficult.
customer_reviews.author: rejiii

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Just enough bling . I had to have 3 links removed, so it has a long band if one is worried about the sixe.. It is a great looking watch.
customer_reviews.author: nsprinks

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch for myself as a BIRTHDAY gift for me. Love it!! My husband easily removed the required links to fit my thin wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, stylish dress watch.
customer_reviews.text: Not too glitzy, but just enough, plus the mother of pearl face really makes a very nice, classy watch. I wanted to upgrade from my older thin gold watch with a couple of diamonds and this is more in style, and I like the solar idea. Plus, contrary to other watches, I can actually READ the date with these "older" eyes. It was a birthday gift I bought for myself. I'm very pleased. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: I love the watch and don't want to return it
customer_reviews.text: I love the watch and don't want to return it. However, the watch's date has not been correct since I received it. There were many complaints from previous customers saying the date didn't work. Well, it still doesn't. Seiko has a good reputation. They need to fix this problem. I won't buy another Seiko unless they take responsibility for this flaw that has happened with quite a few customers.
customer_reviews.author: carol a maloney

customer_reviews.title: attractive watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch is a nice size, easy to see even the date without glasses. Very attractive watch and a big plus never to have to change the battery. I did need to have a few links on the watch band removed
customer_reviews.author: pgb

customer_reviews.title: Band Too Small!
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch - but the band is too small. I have not been able to find a shop that can add an extra link.
customer_reviews.author: Russell R Cannon

customer_reviews.title: beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: It looks exactly like the picture. I had to take 2 links out, so it would fit properly. I would give it 5 stars, except I was a little disappointed that the actual size of the watch is smaller than I expected. It was easy to set the date, and I am almost glad that it is a little smaller. It will go with everything I wear. I expect this watch to last me a long time as it feels well build, and of high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Benton

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. We had purchased a different Seiko a month earlier, but the winding stem broke off. Ordered this lovely watch for half the price of the original one - beautiful watch.
customer_reviews.author: S. Arora

customer_reviews.title: Seiko women's watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch arrived on time & as stated. I have had it for about a week & love it. It can be worn dressy or casual. Not too flashy. I love Seiko watches & have always had good luck with them. The price was great!
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I picked out this watch as a Christmas gift. I think it is gorgeous and I love it. The size of the face is great as it is easy to read, (about the size of a quarter and then the crystals around that) but not too big for a small wrist. The mother of pearl face is even prettier than the picture shows.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Mother of Pearl Watch
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch............I had to remove 4 links from the band which proved to be surprisingly easy to do in order to fit my small wrist . Have received many complements on the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Dino F.

customer_reviews.title: After 1 year of gentle wear and constant placement in a sunny spot this watch has slowed to a point where it is useless!
customer_reviews.text: If you want a solar watch, buy a Citizen not a Seiko. After 1 year of gentle wear and constant placement in a sunny spot this watch has slowed to a point where it is useless!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn G. Stock

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. The size is larger than my old one, easy to read, does not look macho with the glittering crystals, and sun powered for energy efficient and no battery changing hassle. It is the perfect watch for both social and business attire. It keeps time accurately for the 5 days I own it. Time will tell its durability.
customer_reviews.author: AhPu

customer_reviews.title: The size is perfect and it can be worn whether you are dressed ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely watch. The size is perfect and it can be worn whether you are dressed up or dressed down. I wish it would have had a little more weight to the band because I like a substantial feeling watch. However, that is just a small negative. I'm sure there are many who prefer a lighter weight band. All in all, I am happy with this purchase. Helayne F
customer_reviews.author: Jeff F

customer_reviews.title: Seiko... enough said
customer_reviews.text: Best watch in this price point for sure!!! Quality and appearance and beautiful
customer_reviews.author: CarolinaMaryJane

customer_reviews.title: Seiko solar woman's watch
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch and good quality. Got extra links from Seiko because seller didn't put extra ones with the watch and didn't offer to send any after I contact the seller. Everyone's wrist is not one size.
customer_reviews.author: lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Seiko Women's Solar Watch
customer_reviews.text: After shopping around a while for a watch, I'm glad I purchased this watch. The size of the face is perfect; not too big or small and the best thing about it is no more batteries to buy since it operates on solar energy. I would definitely recommend this watch others looking for a quality watch at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Super62

customer_reviews.title: Can’t hold a charge.
customer_reviews.text: Looked great. Ran great - until the solar charge ran out. No matter what we did - direct sunlight, indirect sunlight, sun lamp - we could not get this watch to hold a charge for more than a couple of hours. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Balance of Form and Function
customer_reviews.text: I usually go for the very simple design and utility in watches - this time around, I decided that a two-toned metal and a little extra bling might be nice, and this watch is very attractive. I also am trying the solar for the first time. So far so good. All you have to remember is to set it out in the light when not wearing it so it stays charged. The mother-of-pearl face is luminescent and beautiful, and the simple date window is all I need - no extra clutter on the watch face. It's a winner!
customer_reviews.author: CaliKoko

customer_reviews.title: I love thiswatch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. The face is large enough to easily read the time but not so large that it looks bulky. The crystals around the face gives if that little bit of bling that I like. Not having a battery to replace is such a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad watch I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Bought it here on Amazon in Nov 2016. Stopped working in the summer of 2017. After sending it back for repair, I had to wait two months before getting it back. Now it stopped working again. Wish I could give it zero star.
customer_reviews.author: Gene S.

customer_reviews.title: Classy Watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. I had one very similar to it and lost it somehow. My husband gave this to me for my birthday and I am very happy with it. I love the 2 tone and the diamond bezel. It can be worn every day or for going out in the evening. It's classy and timeless. I especially love that it's a solar watch - no batteries, no winding. This is a clear winner!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Ortega

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for a dressy watch, this is it!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is the perfect size not too large and not too small...I priced this watch in 2 jewelry stores and they had it on sale....$60 to $65 dollars more.Its very good quality the third store was a department store ...still more then amazon...Great watch at a great price!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Kay

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL! PERFECT! WHAT A DEAL!
customer_reviews.text: This watch stays running and keeps perfect time, just from my wearing it in the daylight. The crystals are well mounted and look just like my sister in law's real diamond watch. The face is not too large or too small. I hope it last a very long time as it is beautiful for casual and dress up wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Marie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: OMG, this watch is beautiful. I love that it's solar no batteries needed. The bling is pretty and the two tone works with all jewelry. The best and most perfect thing about this time piece is that it is stainless steel as I can only ware 14K gold and SS.
customer_reviews.author: rain

product_meta.title: Seiko Women's SUT074 Dress Two-Tone Stainless Steel Swarovski Crystal-Accented Solar Watch
product_meta.description:
From Humble beginnings, Kintaro Hattori’s Vision for Seiko has become reality. A consuming passion for excellence - imprinted in our Corporate DNA passed from generation to generation. Seiko, for 125 years committed to the art and science of time.

 A culture of innovation connects a 19th century Tokyo clock shop with 20th century advances in timekeeping to an extraordinary 21st century "quiet revolution." Continually driven by dedication and passion, established a multitude of world’s first technologies… transforming the principles of timekeeping. 

 The first quartz wristwatch – changed the history of time. 

 The first Kinetic – marked a new era in quartz watch technology. 

 In 1969, Seiko Astron, the first quartz wristwatch - was introduced. 

 In an instant, Seiko exponentially improved the accuracy of wristwatches –And Seiko technology firmly established today’s standard in Olympic and sports timing. 

 1984, another celebrated first – Kinetic Technology – powered by body movement. 

 Kinetic – a quartz mechanism with unparalleled accuracy –the driving force behind more world’s firsts. 

 Kinetic Chronograph – the next generation of high performance timekeeping. 

 Kinetic Auto Relay – automatically resets to the correct time. 

 Kinetic Perpetual - combining the date perfect technology of perpetual calendar with the genius of Kinetic Auto Relay. 

 And now Kinetic Direct Drive – move, and the watch is powered automatically. Or hand wind it and see the power you are generating in real time. 

 In the realm of fine watches, time is measured by Seiko innovation – A heritage of dedication to the art and science of time.



Seiko Solar. No battery change required and powered by all types of light. Solar cell with high performance electricity generation. Energy-efficient movement with long power reserve. This elegant dress watch has a brushed and polished two-tone stainless steel case and bracelet featuring Swarovski crystals on the bezel. The timepiece is constructed with a durable crystal that protects the mother-of-pearl dial. Date calendar. 30 meters water resistant.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :4.9 x 3.8 x 2.8 inches; 6.4 Ounces
 * Item model number :SUT074
 * Department :Womens
 * Batteries :1 Product Specific batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :August 13, 2012
 * Manufacturer :Seiko
 * ASIN :B008X6JEAU

 * .zg_hrsr_item {list-style : none};
 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #164,969 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #611 inWomen's Wrist Watches 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.3 out of 5 stars599 ratings

Continually driven by dedication and passion, established a multitude of world’s first technologies… transforming the principles of timekeeping.

 In 1969, Seiko Astron, the first quartz wristwatch - was introduced. 

 In an instant, Seiko exponentially improved the accuracy of wristwatches –And Seiko technology firmly established today’s standard in Olympic and sports timing.

The timepiece is constructed with a durable crystal that protects the mother-of-pearl dial. Date calendar. 30 meters water resistant.
feature_bullets: Round watch with pearlescent dial featuring placed indices, crystal-studded bezel, and date window at three o'clock
28.1 mm stainless steel case with Hardlex dial window
Japanese quartz movement with analog display
Two-tone stainless steel band with push-button clasp.Mother of pearl dial
Water resistant to 30 m (99 ft): In general, withstands splashes or brief immersion in water, but not suitable for swimming
